Class JacksonUtils

java.lang.Object
org.krmdemo.techlabs.json.JacksonUtils
public class JacksonUtils extends Object
Utility class to serialize / de-serialize JSON-Objects and JSON-Arrays using Jackson Library
See Also:
  • Jackson Library Documentation

    • jsonObjFromResource

      public static Map<String,Object> jsonObjFromResource(String resourcePath)
      Parameters:
      resourcePath - the path to JSON-resource within the current class-path (no leading slash !!!)
      Returns:
      de-serialized JSON-Object as Map

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type to de-serialize the JSON-value to
      Parameters:
      jsonFile - a file that contains JSON-value
      typeRef - a type-reference to cast the de-serialized object to
      Returns:
      de-serialized JSON-vlaue of type T

      Parameters:
      value - the object to dump
      Returns:

    • dumpAsJsonPrettyPrint

      public static String dumpAsJsonPrettyPrint(Object value)
      Parameters:
      value - the object to dump in a pretty-print way
      Returns:
      serialized object in JSON-format (pretty-print - the keys are sorted and arrays are indented)

      Prettify the passed un-formatted JSON
      Parameters:
      jsonToPrettify - JSON to prettify
      Returns:
